Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by ashpie I noticed along my rib in the middle of both breast I hAVE A LUMP ON MY RIBS ITS ON BOTH SIDES BUT IS MUCH more prominent on the left side..is this normal anatomy or something I should be concerned about? it is smooth all around and feels like it is part of my rib..there is no seperate lump only a round feeling..my mom felt it and said it was my rib but I don't remember it being that prominent.. I have the same thing. I actually have bigger everything on my left side since this side is dominant. My breast, my fingers, my eyeball...everything is bigger! I was worried at first too but then realized that the older you get the more you notice!
Posts.Title: knobby bump on rib along bra line
